text: Yā pana bhikkhunī jānaṃ saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ puggalassa pariṇāmeyya pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yā pana bhikkhunī jānaṃ saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ puggalassa pariṇāmeyya pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 160. Should anybhikkhunī knowingly divert to an individual gains that had been allocated for a Community, it is to be confessed.
